alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 2:37AM PST until February 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches above 5500 feet, except 7 to 18 inches west of US-395. Up to 3 inches are possible below 5500 feet. Southwest wind gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Bands of heavier snow showers continuing through Sunday will produce rapid changes in visibility and road conditions.
info.instruction: Even lighter snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
